function_args.user_input: Run the full analysis for the MEFANE demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios, all the scenarios, all the target years, split the numbers.

tasks.description: Run the MEFANE demand full analysis by decomposing (splitting) annual demand into time-series profiles for all TYNDP 2026 scenarios and all target years.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Run the full analysis for the MEFANE demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 scenarios, all the scenarios, all the target years, split the numbers.', select all TYNDP 2026 scenarios and all target years relevant to MEFANE demand processing.
